main event: A witness observed a bright light in the sky that was hovering and moving erratically in Thaxton, Virginia on January 2, 1965.
interesting points: The object was reported to be larger than a jet.,The object made a humming sound.,The object was observed for about 2 minutes.,The object was stationary during the observation.,No physical evidence was found at the scene.
witness description: Mr. A.R. Thaxton reported the sighting.
